stat.name: Top Five Species
stat.sql: select tn,count(tx) as namecnt from (select determination.TaxonNameId, taxonname.TaxonNameID as tx, taxonname.TaxonName as tn from taxonname,determination where determination.TaxonNameId = taxonname.taxonnameid) as newTable group by tx order by namecnt DESC;

stat.name: Specimens by Country

chartinfo.title: Top 7 Number of Specimens by Country

stat.sql: select Country, count(CollectionObjectID) AS SpecimenCount from collectionobject as CO inner join collectingevent as CE on CE.CollectingEventID = CO.CollectingEventID inner join locality as L on L.LocalityID = CE.LocalityID inner join geography as G on G.GeographyID = L.GeographyID group by Country order by SpecimenCount DESC

stat.name: ListOnLoan
stat.title: Items on Loan
stat.sql: Select distinct loan.LoanNumber as LoanNumber, loan.LoanDate, loan.CurrentDueDate, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName,loan.OriginalDueDate, loanphysicalobject.Quantity, loanphysicalobject.DescriptionOfMaterial, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Country From loan Inner Join loanphysicalobject ON loan.LoanID = loanphysicalobject.LoanID Inner Join loanagents ON loan.LoanID = loanagents.LoanID Inner Join agentaddress ON loanagents.AgentAddressID = agentaddress.AgentAddressID Inner Join address ON agentaddress.AddressID = address.AddressID Inner Join agent ON agentaddress.AgentID = agent.AgentID where loan.loanid in (select loanid from loan where category = 0 and (closed = 0 or closed is null)) group by LoanNumber

stat.name: OverdueLoansList
stat.title: Overdue Loans
stat.sql: Select distinct loan.LoanNumber as LoanNumber, loan.LoanDate, loan.CurrentDueDate, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName,loan.OriginalDueDate, loanphysicalobject.Quantity, loanphysicalobject.DescriptionOfMaterial, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Country From loan Inner Join loanphysicalobject ON loan.LoanID = loanphysicalobject.LoanID Inner Join loanagents ON loan.LoanID = loanagents.LoanID Inner Join agentaddress ON loanagents.AgentAddressID = agentaddress.AgentAddressID Inner Join address ON agentaddress.AddressID = address.AddressID Inner Join agent ON agentaddress.AgentID = agent.AgentID where loan.loanid in (select loanid from loan where (not (currentduedate is null)) and category = 0 and (closed = 0 or closed is null) and datediff(CURDATE(), currentduedate) > 0) group by LoanNumber
